segments.advisor_message: So, uh, let's start with some basics, ya know? Can I have, um, your full name? Like, first name, last name and maybe any middle names you might, uh, have?
segments.client_message: Sure, my name's, uh, Jhonny Walsh. And no middle names, just Jhonny. But, a lot of my friends just call me J. It's, uh, simpler, I guess!

segments.advisor_message: Got it! Jhonny, that's cool. Now, um, do you have any prefered pronouns? Also, if you don't mind sharing, what’s your date of birth?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I use he/him pronouns. And I was born, like, 15-06-1990. Not that I, uh, really celebrate my birthday or anything, but yeah, that's it.
